prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to see how your day is going.  

Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive on Thursday.  

Reminder: Your dentist appointment is scheduled for 3 PM tomorrow.  

Can we reschedule our meeting to Friday? Let me know what works for you.  

Just checking in to see if you got home safely.  

Your OTP code is 123456. Please enter it to proceed.  

Looking forward to the movie night this weekend! What time should we meet?  

Hi! I just wanted to confirm our lunch plans for tomorrow at noon.  

Your bank statement is ready for review. Log into your account to see the details.  

Don't forget about the community cleanup event this Saturday at 10 AM!  

Thanks for your patience! Your refund has been processed and should reflect in your account shortly.  

Happy birthday! Hope you have an amazing day filled with fun and laughter.  

I'm running a bit late, but I’ll be there in about 15 minutes!  

Just wanted to remind you that the concert tickets are in my inbox.  

Hi! Can you send me the notes from yesterday’s meeting?  

Your subscription will renew on the 15th. Let us know if you want to make any changes.  

Hey, can you grab some milk on your way home? Thanks!  

We’re having a team meeting on Monday at 10 AM. Please be prepared to discuss your projects.  

The weather looks great for our hike tomorrow! Can’t wait!  

Your flight has been delayed by two hours. Please check your email for updates.  

I just wanted to drop a quick note to say I miss you!  

The event has been canceled due to unforeseen circumstances.  

Your appointment with the stylist is confirmed for Saturday at 2 PM.  

Thanks for your feedback! We will implement your suggestions in the next update.  

I’ll be out of the office until next week but will respond to your email as soon as I return.  

Just a quick reminder about your workout class tomorrow at 6 PM.  

Hey, did you get a chance to finish that report?  

Your delivery is out for delivery and should arrive by the end of the day.  

I hope everything is okay. I haven’t heard from you in a while.  

Looking forward to our trip next month! Have you booked the hotels yet?  

Your account has been successfully updated. Thank you for your prompt response.  

Let's catch up over coffee next week! What day works best for you?  

The school board meeting will take place on Wednesday at 7 PM.  

I just wanted to confirm that I received your payment. Thank you!  

Let me know if you’re free for a quick call later today.  

The library is hosting a book fair this weekend. Would you like to go together?  

Your registration for the webinar has been confirmed.  

Thanks for helping out with the party planning! You’re the best.  

Your account security alert has been triggered. Please verify your recent activity.  

Just finished reading that book you recommended! Loved it!  

Can you please send me the link to that article you mentioned?  

We’re meeting at the café at 4 PM. Don’t be late!  

Your feedback is important to us! Please take a moment to fill out our survey.  

Just checking in! How’s your new job going so far?  

There’s a family gathering this Sunday at my place. Hope you can make it!  

Your monthly bill is due next week. Please ensure payment is made on time.  

Excited for the weekend getaway! Don’t forget your sunscreen!  

You have a new message from your bank regarding your recent transaction.  

Can’t wait to see you at the reunion! It’s been too long!  

The project deadline has been extended to next Friday.  

Thanks for the reminder about my car service! I’ll book it today.  

I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  

The restaurant reservation is confirmed for 7 PM tomorrow.  

Just a heads up, I’ll be unavailable this afternoon for a meeting.
